elements.name: Reporting the results of the Las Vegas Grand Prix in the year two thousand and twenty-three as a BBC editor

steps.name: I am on the Formula One section of the website

I select the Two Thousand and Twenty-Three tab
I select the Las Vegas Grand Prix from the dropdown menu

elements.name: Searching for Sport in the year two thousand and twenty-three and getting at least four relevant results
